meanings.sent1: The sunstruck flowers bloomed beautifully in the garden.
meanings.sent2: Her sunstruck skin turned a shade darker after a day at the beach.
meanings.sent3: The sunstruck cat lazily stretched out in the warm sunlight.
meanings.sent4: The sunstruck landscape glowed with a golden hue as evening approached.
meanings.sent5: The sunstruck leaves shimmered in the gentle breeze, reflecting the sunlight.

meanings.sent1: The sunstruck hiker felt the heat on his shoulders as he climbed the mountain.
meanings.sent2: The sunstruck pavement was too hot to walk on barefoot.
meanings.sent3: The sunstruck car dashboard was scorching to the touch.
meanings.sent4: The sunstruck beach umbrella provided much-needed shade on a hot day.
meanings.sent5: The sunstruck roof tiles radiated warmth in the afternoon sun.
